channel.title: How do i make my server world-wide on moparscape client?
channel.description:
i really need help with this, please say how and why and what to do, i can only get onto my server in localhost, or 0.0.0.0 and port 10102 please help
!@mahatma@!

item.title: How do i make my server world-wide on moparscape client?
item.dc:creator: @owner_Ethan owner Ethan
item.description:
@owner_Ethan wrote:

go scroll down look at left side click download now then click submit dont fill out anything ur name ur email address leave it blank then a screen will come up click yes and then download starts click run then run the installization then yeh u got it then you click the triangle in bottom left of hamachi go to create network make a name and password share password ip port and name of network and then thats how ppl will get on your server

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my server world-wide on moparscape client?

item.title: How do i make my server world-wide on moparscape client?
item.dc:creator: @X_Owner_X X Owner X
item.description:
@X_Owner_X wrote:

[quote=“ScimmyScape, post:2, topic:103175”]Okay what you need to do is Download Hamachi at Www.Hamachi.Cc
Then make a account on it once it downloads and stuff, click on the triangle at the very bottem right hand cornor of your Ham Box. Then hit Create A New NetWork, Make a name and set a password.
Then there should be a number at the top of that box such as 5.124.67.124 or w/e there all random, thats your servers IP. People use that number to conect to your server.
Then go To MoparScape Server Advirtisment and make a Topic about your server exsplaining your server details and IP, and Port and such.
Then people will join your ham network and they will get on your server threw your Ham IP.[/quote]Pretty much.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my server world-wide on moparscape client?

item.title: How do i make my server world-wide on moparscape client?
item.dc:creator: @ScimmyScape ScimmyScape
item.description:
@ScimmyScape wrote:

Okay what you need to do is Download Hamachi at Www.Hamachi.Cc
Then make a account on it once it downloads and stuff, click on the triangle at the very bottem right hand cornor of your Ham Box. Then hit Create A New NetWork, Make a name and set a password.
Then there should be a number at the top of that box such as 5.124.67.124 or w/e there all random, thats your servers IP. People use that number to conect to your server.
Then go To MoparScape Server Advirtisment and make a Topic about your server exsplaining your server details and IP, and Port and such.
Then people will join your ham network and they will get on your server threw your Ham IP.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my server world-wide on moparscape client?
